description: Stores the invoice numbers that have been removed from a bucket during a billing activity

columns.name: BFH_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the billing activity history record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: ACT_INV_NUM_REMOVED
columns.description: Stores the invoice numbers that were removed from a bucket
